subject: ComfyUI-BiRefNet-ZHO
questions: What are the improvements in the new ComfyUI-BiRefNet-ZHO plugin compared to the original one?
What versions of media does ComfyUI-BiRefNet-ZHO support?
answers: ComfyUI-BiRefNet-ZHO is a better version of the BiRefNet plugin for ComfyUI, which can process both images and videos.
The new plugin features model loading and image processing separation, resulting in faster processing. It can directly output transparent background PNG images and handle video processing.
BiRefNet is currently the best open-source, commercially usable background removal model.
ComfyUI-BiRefNet-ZHO supports both image and video processing.
To install ComfyUI-BiRefNet-ZHO, clone the repository into the custom_nodes directory and run `pip install -r requirements.txt`. Then, restart ComfyUI.
